attributes.action: cancel the landfill tax rise due in april to assist hauliers and skip hire companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: builders use skips throughout all building work and the extra increase of £8.00 per ton due in april will increase the price of a skip by approx £30.00 this cannot be a good thing to encourage building work to start again some jobs require 30 or more skips which could tip the scales on whether they get the job or not.
